nodes.text: Lyyr Zatoq was a female Quarren pilot in Rogue Squadron from Mon Calamari. Lyyr's X-wing was shot down in battle above the moon Distna in the Corvis Minor system by Delak Krennel's TIE fighters and bombers. Her body was recovered by Booster Terrik and Mirax Terrik. The rest of Rogue Squadron, aside from Wes Janson and Asyr Sei'lar (whose survival was hidden kept secret at her request) was believed dead.
